prismata: Prismata is a free strategy/card game hybrid with no RNG, no P2W, and no bullshit. It has deep PvP, actually good AI opponents, and a single-player story campaign Kreygasm
basics: Your units are at the bottom, enemy is at the top. You collect resources (bottom left) from drones and buildings to buy an army of attackers (sword) from the available units on the left, then kill all the enemy units SMOrc
sets: The 11 units of the base set (first tab) are available to buy in every set. The second tab has a set of 4-11 random units, the same for both players. This makes each game different, but still balanced SeemsGood
f2p: Prismata is a free game, but currently in closed beta! The Founder's pack comes with immediate access, but keys for the free tier are also liberally given away on the discord. Just ask! OhMyDog
p2w: All units are available to all players. You can only grind/pay to unlock skins and emotes SeemsGood
key: Keys are being given away liberally on the discord! Just ask! OhMyDog discord .com/invite/prismata
chill: Units with Chill abilities can add an amount of Chill to enemy units. Units can't block if their Chill equals or exceeds their health ‚ùÑ
fragile: Fragile units (marked with <3) can be partially damaged. Normal units have to be killed in one shot
frontline: Frontline units (marked with a blue target) can be attacked directly by the enemy, without having to go through blockers
